attributes.action: Refund Tuition Fees to Students for the Duration of University Strikes
attributes.additional_details:
Students are losing lectures and tutorials, but are required to pay full tuition fees.

Universities MUST be required to refund tuition fees where teaching activities are lost.
attributes.background: University staff strikes took place over 3 days in November, spread over a period of 2 weeks. UCU has announced further 18 days of strike action taking place over 7 weeks in February and March. This will amount to 9 weeks with some form of teaching activity disruption.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628976
